title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: User Submission Automatic Feedback Response
description: The user submission automatic feedback response enables organizations to automatically respond to end user submissions of phish based on the verdict from the automated investigation.  This feature is configurable and allows organizations to dictate in which threat scenarios they would like end users to receive feedback emails. Once enabled, Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) will automatically respond to end user submissions based on the investigation verdict and the configured settings.
